Spansion:OldOneTwo.NAME: The Ol' One-Two
Spansion:OldOneTwo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage twice, applying !M! vulnerable after each hit.

Spansion:FancyFootwork.NAME: Fancy Footwork
Spansion:FancyFootwork.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intend to attack, gain !B! Block.  Otherwise draw !M! Card(s).

Spansion:AspectOfTheCrow.NAME: Aspect Of The Crow
Spansion:AspectOfTheCrow.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, gain !M! strength and dexterity.  Lose that strength and dexterity at the end of your turn.
Spansion:AspectOfTheCrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, gain !M! strength and dexterity.  Lose that strength and dexterity at the end of your turn.
